medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute abdominal pain in the right lower quadrant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain had an acute onset since the morning of admission. The patient had subjective fever earlier but has been afebrile since. She has not experienced any nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, or constipation. There was potential blood noted in the last bowel movement. No previous similar symptoms have occurred.
